Class Protagonist

  • java.lang.Object
    • Protagonist
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    masterProtagonist

    public class Protagonist
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the main character, as the player that is playing the game. Holds the weapons, armor, and stats of the protagonist.
    Version:
    May 25, 2015
    Author:
    Edward Hu, Oliver Dong, David Yang, Period: 6, Assignment: ARPEGGIO
